content: The Skandha of Form can be found within the Forest of Wolves, Front Hills Shrine in Black Wind Mountain. This is the first Shrine in the game. Upon crossing the bridge soon after the Shrine, loop around to the left to find a river and a monkey.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Form.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Form'.
The content is as follows:
The Skandha of Form can be found within the Forest of Wolves, Front Hills Shrine in Black Wind Mountain. This is the first Shrine in the game. Upon crossing the bridge soon after the Shrine, loop around to the left to find a river and a monkey.
